list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add unit tests and GitHub action for pytest automation
This update introduces unit tests for the `Database` and `LeetCode` classes in test_database.py and test_leetcode.py. A GitHub action is also added for automatically running pytest on push and pull requests to the `main` branch. Lastly, the database connection in `Database` is now optional, and pytest is included in the dev dependencies.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "Python tests.Python tests for test_database.TestDatabase.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for test_database.test_insert_problem.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for test_database.test_insert_study_plan_problem.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for test_leetcode.TestLeetCode.executor": "Run", "Python tests.Python tests for test_leetcode.TestLeetCode.test_fetch_and_store_study_plan.executor": "Run", "Python.main.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "main", "last_opened_file_path": "/Users/nicholas/Documents/GitHub/github.com/daily-coding-problem/leetcode-scraper", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "com.jetbrains.python.configuration.PyActiveSdkModuleConfigurable", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" }, "keyToStringList": { "DatabaseDriversLRU": [ "postgresql" ] } }

task.summary:
Initialize the project
This commit introduces utilities that support customizable banners and handle project details like version and authors. It also sets up the `Client` class to fetch problem and study plan details from LeetCode's API. The `Problem` and `StudyPlan` models are utilized for parsing and organizing data from the API. The database interactions have been structured with the execute insert function in the database package. Lastly, Git Toolbox Blame Settings and IDE metadata files were also added.

Update README markdown formatting
The markdown formatting in the README.md file was updated to improve readability. Code snippets and environment variable segments have been revised with their indentation reduced. The change offers a cleaner separation of sections, making it easier for users to follow.

Add unit tests and GitHub action for pytest automation
This update introduces unit tests for the `Database` and `LeetCode` classes in test_database.py and test_leetcode.py. A GitHub action is also added for automatically running pytest on push and pull requests to the `main` branch. Lastly, the database connection in `Database` is now optional, and pytest is included in the dev dependencies.

MESSAGE.value:
Initialize the project
This commit introduces utilities that support customizable banners and handle project details like version and authors. It also sets up the `Client` class to fetch problem and study plan details from LeetCode's API. The `Problem` and `StudyPlan` models are utilized for parsing and organizing data from the API. The database interactions have been structured with the execute insert function in the database package. Lastly, Git Toolbox Blame Settings and IDE metadata files were also added.

Update README markdown formatting
The markdown formatting in the README.md file was updated to improve readability. Code snippets and environment variable segments have been revised with their indentation reduced. The change offers a cleaner separation of sections, making it easier for users to follow.

Add unit tests and GitHub action for pytest automation
This update introduces unit tests for the `Database` and `LeetCode` classes in test_database.py and test_leetcode.py. A GitHub action is also added for automatically running pytest on push and pull requests to the `main` branch. Lastly, the database connection in `Database` is now optional, and pytest is included in the dev dependencies.

Add unit tests and GitHub action for pytest automation
This commit introduces unit tests for `Database` and `LeetCode` classes and adds a GitHub action for pytest. It also makes the database connection in `Database` optional and includes pytest in the dev dependencies.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Add unit tests and GitHub action for pytest automation
This commit introduces unit tests for `Database` and `LeetCode` classes and adds a GitHub action for pytest. It also makes the database connection in `Database` optional and includes pytest in the dev dependencies.
